mapper.select:
select * from dl_nv t where t.del='1'
and t.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
and t.tel like CONCAT('%', #{tel}, '%')
and t.address like CONCAT('%', #{address}, '%')
and t.city like CONCAT('%', #{city}, '%')
and t.sex like CONCAT('%', #{sex}, '%')
and t.sch like CONCAT('%', #{sch}, '%')
and t.xl like CONCAT('%', #{xl}, '%')
and t.borth like CONCAT('%', #{borth}, '%')
and t.age like CONCAT('%', #{age}, '%')
and t.emil like CONCAT('%', #{emil}, '%')
order by t.borth desc LIMIT 1,1000

select count(*) from dl_nv t where t.del='1'
and t.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
and t.tel like CONCAT('%', #{tel}, '%')
and t.address like CONCAT('%', #{address}, '%')
and t.city like CONCAT('%', #{city}, '%')
and t.sex like CONCAT('%', #{sex}, '%')
and t.sch like CONCAT('%', #{sch}, '%')
and t.xl like CONCAT('%', #{xl}, '%')
and t.borth like CONCAT('%', #{borth}, '%')
and t.age like CONCAT('%', #{age}, '%')
and t.emil like CONCAT('%', #{emil}, '%')

select * from dl_nv t where t.del='1'
and t.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
and t.tel like CONCAT('%', #{tel}, '%')
and t.address like CONCAT('%', #{address}, '%')
and t.city like CONCAT('%', #{city}, '%')
and t.sex like CONCAT('%', #{sex}, '%')
and t.sch like CONCAT('%', #{sch}, '%')
and t.xl like CONCAT('%', #{xl}, '%')
and t.borth like CONCAT('%', #{borth}, '%')
and t.age like CONCAT('%', #{age}, '%')
and t.emil like CONCAT('%', #{emil}, '%')
order by t.borth desc LIMIT #{beginPage},#{endPage}

select * from users t
and t.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
and t.tel like CONCAT('%', #{tel}, '%')
and t.city like CONCAT('%', #{city}, '%')
and t.xl like CONCAT('%', #{xl}, '%')
and t.borth like CONCAT('%', #{borth}, '%')
and t.age like CONCAT('%', #{age}, '%')
order by t.borth desc LIMIT #{beginPage},#{endPage}

select count(*) from users t
and t.name like CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
and t.tel like CONCAT('%', #{tel}, '%')
and t.city like CONCAT('%', #{city}, '%')
and t.xl like CONCAT('%', #{xl}, '%')
and t.borth like CONCAT('%', #{borth}, '%')
and t.age like CONCAT('%', #{age}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into users ( name, tel, xl, midetel, borth, age, personName, hukou, city ) values ( #{name}, #{tel}, #{xl}, #{midetel}, #{borth}, #{age}, #{personName}, #{hukou}, #{city} )
